verses.name: John 6:65
verses.text: And he said, Therefore said I unto you, that no man can come unto me, except it were given unto him of my Father.

verses.name: John 6:66
verses.text: From that time many of his disciples went back, and walked no more with him.

verses.name: John 6:67
verses.text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve, Will ye also go away?

verses.name: John 6:68
verses.text: Then Simon Peter answered him, Lord, to whom shall we go? thou hast the words of eternal life.

verses.name: John 6:69
verses.text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ, the Son of the living God.
